welcome_message_body: Welcome to Spanish Fort, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, historical landmarks, and Southern hospitality. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mobile Downtown Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: The executive terminal at Mobile Downtown Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mobile Regional Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Mobile Regional Airport serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Mobile Regional Airport serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
